titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Brian Carpenter

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-09-13T21:14-0400

did.unittitle: Potawatomi language recordings
did.physdesc: 16 sound cassettes (18 hr., 4 min.) : analog, 1 7/8 ips, stereo.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Laura Buszard-Welcher in 1995 (Acc. 1995-144r). This material was recorded with the assistance of a Phillips Fund grant.

did.unittitle: Audio recordings
Potawatomi language class

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Potawatomi language class held at the College of the Potawatomi Center taught by Julia Wesaw and Martin Wesaw. Small informal group. Vocabulary drills. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 1, program 1. Formerly numbered 1:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Potawatomi language class

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Potawatomi language class held at the College of the Potawatomi Center taught by Julia Wesaw and Martin Wesaw. Small informal group. Vocabulary drills. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 1, program 2. Formerly numbered 2:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia & John Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Conversation in English about berry picking, boarding school, and speaking Potawatomi. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 2, program 1. Formerly numbered 2:2.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia & John Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Conversation in English about racial discrimination, personal stories, berry picking, and baskets. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 2, program 2. Formerly numbered 3:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia Wesaw & Ella Louis

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Discussion of speaking and learning Potawatomi. Discussion and elicitation of words for the seasons, birds and animals, times of the day, and weather. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 3, program 1. Formerly numbered 3:2.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia Wesaw & Ella Louis

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of miscellaneous Potawatomi words and phrases, as well as words for animals, birds, and household items. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 3, program 2. Formerly numbered 3:3.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia Wesaw & Ella Louis

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Discussion of basket making. Elicitation of Potawatomi words for colors, animals, and parts of the body. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 3, program 3. Formerly numbered 4:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia Wesaw & Ella Louis

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi words for animals, food, money, parts of the body, and miscellaneous terms, followed by general discussion. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 3, program 4. Formerly numbered 4:2.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia Wesaw on the making of Black Ash baskets

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: General conversation and description of basket-making, including some Potawatomi vocabulary. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 4, program 1. Formerly numbered 4:3.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia Wesaw on the making of Black Ash baskets

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Conversation in English about basket making while consultant makes a basket, with other conversation on cooking turtle, other animals, and pottery making. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 4, program 2. Formerly numbered 5:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Informal interview conducted while consultant made baskets. TV in background. Many long pauses. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 4, program 3. Formerly numbered 5:2.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Informal interview conducted while consultant made baskets. TV in background. Many long pauses. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 4, program 4. Formerly numbered 5:3.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia Wesaw reading words and phrases from Daniels' text

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Interview with readings and elicitations from B. Daniels, et al., eds., "Potawatomi Language Manual, Resource Materials and Training Exercises" (Milwaukee: Great Lakes Inter-Tribal Council, Inc., University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee, 1976) Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 5, program 1. Formerly numbered 6:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Julia Wesaw reading words and phrases from Daniels' text

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Interview with readings and elicitations from B. Daniels, et al., eds., "Potawatomi Language Manual, Resource Materials and Training Exercises" (Milwaukee: Great Lakes Inter-Tribal Council, Inc., University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee, 1976) Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 5, program 2. Formerly numbered 6:2.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Discussion followed by the text "When I was young" about childhood and personal history given in Potawatomi and English. Elicitation of numbers. Discussion of Potawatomi speakers. Elicitation of verb paradigms for 'walk,' 'to be red,' and 'hit.' Discussion of making maple syrup. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 6, program 1. Formerly numbered 7:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Interview, with the text "Making Maple Syrup" given in English. Conversation in English on consultant's personal history, a tornado, and selling baskets. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 6, program 2. Formerly numbered 7:2.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Interview, with text "Making Maple Syrup" given in Potawatomi, conversation on picking blueberries, and miscellaneous elicited vocabulary. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 7, program 1. Formerly numbered 8:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi words for fruits, vegetables, animals, trees, followed by verb paradigms for 'hit.' Includes general conversation and analysis of earlier text, "When I was young." Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 7, program 2. Formerly numbered 9:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Discussion of hunting and elicitation of related Potawatomi words. Conversation about berry-picking, followed by story about huckleberries. Ends with elicitation of verb paradigms for 'hit.' Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 8, program 1. Formerly numbered 10:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi verb paradigms for 'hit.' Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 8, program 2. Formerly numbered 10:2.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Interview, including text "Going to school" given in Potawatomi and English, story about being in the Navy in World War II, and discussion of life after being in the service. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 9, program 1. Formerly numbered 11:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Recollections in English, elicitations of Potawatomi verb paradigms for "walk," "hit," and "to be round," with general English conversation. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 9, program 2. Formerly numbered 12:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview and elicitations with Julia Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi questions, variations of "go," seasons, and negated sentences, with general conversation. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 10, program 1. Formerly numbered 12:2.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview, texts, and elicitations with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi sentences, words for directions, and review of material from earlier text, "Going to school." Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 11, program 1. Formerly numbered 13:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview, texts, and elicitations with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of miscellaneous Potawatomi vocabulary, discussion of old sayings, conversation about granddaughter, texts "Barney Google" and "Sorehead" given in Potawatomi and English, and "Getting lost" in English. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 11, program 2. Formerly numbered 14:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview and elicitations with Julia Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi verbs and terms for clothing and household items. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 12, program 1. Formerly numbered 15:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview and elicitations with Julia Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi verbs and adjectives. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 12, program 2. Formerly numbered 16:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview and elicitations with Julia Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi words and phrases, primarily verbs, with terms for birds and clothing. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 13, program 1. Formerly numbered 17:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview and elicitations with Julia Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi words and phrases. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 13, program 2. Formerly numbered 17:2.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Interview, with the text "Setting traps" given in Potawatomi and English, and "Getting lost" in Potawatomi. Conversation on growing fruits and vegetables. Elicitation of Potawatomi words related to fishing. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 14, program 1. Formerly numbered 18:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview and elicitations with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi words and phrases, primarily verbs and terms for clothing. Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 14, program 2. Formerly numbered 19:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Interview and elicitations with Martin Wesaw

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicitation of Potawatomi verb paradigms for "hit," "see," and "cry." Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Original tape 15, program 1. Formerly numbered 19:2.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.
